data.question: What is the empirical formula for FDM-4 based on atoms located by single X-ray diffraction?
What temperature was used for the single crystal structure determination of FDM-5?
What is the crystal system and space group for FDM-6?
What is the formula weight of FDM-7?
What method was used for absorption correction in the structure determination of FDM-4?
How does the ratio of Cu(I) to Cu(II) change after vacuum activation at 200 °C for FDM-3?
data.answer: The ratio of Cu(I) to Cu(II) changes to approximately 3:0 after vacuum activation at 200 °C for FDM-3.

data.question: What is the observed effect on the crystal color of FDM-4 after exposure to air?
data.answer: The crystal color of FDM-4 turns blue after exposure to air.

data.question: What is the role of TEMPO in the alcohol oxidation experiments conducted with FDM-4?
data.answer: TEMPO acts as a cocatalyst in the alcohol oxidation experiments conducted with FDM-4.

data.question: True or False: The PXRD pattern of activated FDM-6 remains unchanged after CO oxidation.
What safety precaution is recommended during the H2O2 decomposition experiments with FDM-3?
data.answer: Adequate safety precautions are recommended due to the potential for fast H2O2 decomposition and explosive pressure rupture.

data.question: What is the effect of heating under vacuum on the Cu valence state in FDM-5?
data.answer: Heating under vacuum increases the percentage of Cu(I) ions in FDM-5.

data.question: What is the formula change for FDM-4 upon complete oxidation?
data.answer: The formula changes to {(Zn4O)5[CuII3(μ-OH)(PyC)3(OH)3]6(PyC)6}·[Zn(OH)(H2O)3]6 upon complete oxidation.

data.question: True or False: The pore size distribution of FDM-7 indicates the presence of mesopores.
What is the role of N-methylimidazole (NMI) in the alcohol oxidation experiments?
data.answer: N-methylimidazole (NMI) acts as a cocatalyst in the alcohol oxidation experiments.

data.question: What is the observed effect on the crystal structure of FDM-4 after H2O2 decomposition experiment?
data.answer: The crystal structure of FDM-4 loses its high crystallinity after the H2O2 decomposition experiment.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of FDM-4 involves the use of N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF) and N-methyl-2-pyrrolidone (NMP).
What is the effect of solvent exchange with CH2Cl2 on the activation of FDM-5?
data.answer: The solvent exchange with CH2Cl2 is part of the activation process for FDM-5, preparing it for further drying under vacuum.

data.question: What is the significance of the ratio of Zn to Cu in the empirical formula determination for FDM-4?
data.answer: The higher ratio of Zn to Cu in the empirical formula for FDM-4 indicates the existence of isolated Zn ions in the pores, needed as compensating ions in the oxidized form of the MOF.

data.question: True or False: The DRIFTS spectra of activated FDM-7 after interacting with CO show strong interaction between CO and the Cu(I) sites.
What is the observed effect on the crystal color of FDM-6 after exposure to air?
data.answer: The crystal color of FDM-6 turns blue after exposure to air.
